mapper.select: select DATA_ID, DATA_ID2, DATA_ID3, DATA_ID4, PROJECT_NAME, GL_DATE, CURRENCY_CODE, CR_AMOUNT, CR_BASE_AMOUNT, EXCHANGE_RATE, RECEIPTS_STATUS, cr_amount_1 CR_AMOUNT1, cr_base_amount_1 CR_BASE_AMOUNT1, METHOD_NAME, RECEIPT_NUMBER, null REQUEST_ID, null PROGRAM_ID, null OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER, null CREATED_BY, null CREATION_DATE, null LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, null LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN from cux_Det_acct_of_rec_in_adv_v@ebs_db WHERE LAST_UPDATE_DATE >= TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(#{lastUpdateDate},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')

select * from ( select HEPD.RECEIPT_ID, HEPD.DATA_ID, HEPD.DATA_ID2, HEPD.DATA_ID3, HEPD.DATA_ID4, HEPD.PROJECT_NAME, HEPD.RECEIPT_NUMBER, HEPD.GL_DATE, HEPD.CURRENCY_CODE, receipt_cuout.CR_AMOUNT, HEPD.CR_BASE_AMOUNT, decode(HEPD.CURRENCY_CODE, 'CNY', 1, HEPD.EXCHANGE_RATE) EXCHANGE_RATE, HEPD.RECEIPTS_STATUS, HEPD.CR_AMOUNT1, HEPD.CR_BASE_AMOUNT1, HEPD.METHOD_NAME, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(partition by HEPD.PROJECT_NAME,HEPD.RECEIPT_NUMBER ORDER BY HEPD.PROJECT_NAME) CN,
from HCUX_EPS_RECEIPT_DETAIL HEPD LEFT JOIN ( SELECT receipt.PROJECT_NAME, receipt.RECEIPT_NUMBER, sum(receipt.CR_AMOUNT) CR_AMOUNT FROM HCUX_EPS_RECEIPT_DETAIL receipt WHERE 1 = 1 AND receipt.CR_AMOUNT != 0 AND receipt.RECEIPTS_STATUS != '已冲销' AND receipt.METHOD_NAME not in('XJ_虚拟收款','XJ_虚拟收款'||'&'||'预付款退款') GROUP BY receipt.PROJECT_NAME, receipt.RECEIPT_NUMBER ) receipt_cuout ON HEPD.PROJECT_NAME = receipt_cuout.PROJECT_NAME AND receipt_cuout.RECEIPT_NUMBER = HEPD.RECEIPT_NUMBER
and lower(HEPD.PROJECT_NAME) like '%'|| lower(#{projectName}) ||'%'
and lower(HEPD.PROJECT_NAME) >= lower(#{projectNameFrom})
and lower(HEPD.PROJECT_NAME) <= lower(#{projectNameTo})
and HEPD.GL_DATE >= to_char(#{glDateFrom},'yyyy-MM-dd')
and HEPD.GL_DATE <= to_char(#{glDateTo},'yyyy-MM-dd')
AND HEPD.CR_AMOUNT != 0 AND HEPD.RECEIPTS_STATUS != '已冲销' AND receipt_cuout.CR_AMOUNT != 0 AND HEPD.METHOD_NAME not in('XJ_虚拟收款','XJ_虚拟收款'||'&'||'预付款退款')
ORDER BY HEPD.GL_DATE DESC,HEPD.RECEIPT_ID DESC ) where CN = 1

select receipt.CURRENCY_CODE CURRENCY_CODE, ROUND(sum(receipt.CR_AMOUNT),2) TOTAL_AMOUNT from HCUX_EPS_RECEIPT_DETAIL receipt
and lower(PROJECT_NAME) like '%'|| lower(#{projectName}) ||'%'
and lower(PROJECT_NAME) >= lower(#{projectNameFrom})
and lower(PROJECT_NAME) <= lower(#{projectNameTo})
and GL_DATE >= to_char(#{glDateFrom},'yyyy-MM-dd')
and GL_DATE <= to_char(#{glDateTo},'yyyy-MM-dd')
AND CR_AMOUNT != 0 AND RECEIPTS_STATUS != '已冲销'
GROUP BY receipt.CURRENCY_CODE
select sum(receipt.CR_BASE_AMOUNT1) CR_BASE_AMOUNT1_TOTAL from HCUX_EPS_RECEIPT_DETAIL receipt where project_name=#{projectName}

select round(sum(CR_AMOUNT_1),2)total_cr_amount from cux_Det_acct_of_rec_in_adv_v@ebs_db where project_name=#{projectName} and LAST_UPDATE_DATE>=to_date('2019-06-01','yyyy-MM-dd') and METHOD_NAME in('XJ_国外_电汇','XJ_国外_电汇'||'&'||'预付款退款', 'XJ_国内_电汇','XJ_国内_电汇'||'&'||'预付款退款','XJ_虚拟收款','XJ_虚拟收款'||'&'||'预付款退款') AND currency_code !='CNY' and LINE_CREATION_DATE >=to_date('2019-06-01','yyyy-MM-dd') and gl_Date <('2019-06-01')
